text:
The jar task produces multiple META-INF/INDEX.LIST entries when the index and 
update attributes are both set to true.  Essentially any META-INF/INDEX.LIST 
entries that already existed in the JAR are retained and a new INDEX.LIST is 
added.  Only the new INDEX.LIST should be maintained.

Working around this "feature" and doing more dependency checking than the jar 
task does by default has led to almost 300 lines of Ant script to 
produce/update one Jar!
